title: Champion Idea - Eris the Lost Summoner
body:
A few friends and myself had an idea for a new champion based around a summoner and came up with this basic idea we need everyone's help to make this cooler, more playable and hopefully a reality

Name: Eris the Lost Summoner

Lore: a new and upcoming summoner got bored with the current summoning style and experimented with different techniques leading to her being trapped in a rift between the Runeterra and the fields of justice, when she returned she was shunned and removed from the facility, joining the once controlled champions to prove her new knowledge and return to the world of summoners

Health:
490 (+80 per level)
Mana:
320 (+60 per level)
Attack Damage:
48 (+3 per level)
Attack Speed:
0.6 (+2% per level)
Movement Speed:
335
Health Regen:
5.6 (+0.6 per level)
Mana Regen:
8 (+0.8 per level)
Armor:
21 (+3.3 per level)
Magic Resist:
30 (+0 per level)

Passive - ethereal - starts game with a single use of "R" to place first gate and allows 3 uses of the gate while active

Q - duel summon - creates a mirror image of target Allie randomly placed to either their left or right side, copies all actions and visual effects and has own heath bar that can be hurt and healed (eg. mundo's r would cause both mundo and mirror to heal) however mirror can not damage and appears grey to allied team or when viewed by oracles ect. duration 1/1.5/2/2.5/3 seconds + 1 second per 200 Ap

W - distorted field - AOE causing initial damage of 20/40/60/80/100 +40%Ap to MANA and 1/2/3/4/5% per second damage to current health (field size slightly increases with rank)

E - Forced disconnect - deals 50/100/150/200/250 +30%Ap and causes target to run back to base as if D/C'd for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds

R - Rift Gate - Channels for 1.5 seconds before creating a gate (must be placed with range of previous gate) the linked gates create a passage usable by ALL for 6 seconds and can be used from either end, upon using the gate the champion receives a debuff preventing use for 10 seconds enemies recieve 1/3/5% max hp damage in addition to the debuff, at the end of the spell the older gate is destroyed increased ranks increases maximum distance between gates
gates can not be destroyed and produce no line of sight 

cooldowns and mana costs would need to be worked on to balance
